item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Quick Start Guide # Introduction # This document provides a guide as following: Install development tools Use the configuration tool Build “proj_ble_adv_conn” demo project Download image to DK Preparation # InPlay DK Board JLink Debugger InPlay SDK Usb cable. Install Tools # Download and install MDK-ARM Keil ÂµVision (Version 5.21 or later is recommended). Download and install J-Link Software and Documentation Pack(Version 7.62 or later is recommended). Install “InPlayInc.DeviceFamilyPack”. Double click the InPlayInc.
